title: Goan prawn curry

ingredients.content: ¼ - ½ tsp Kashmiri chilli powder
450 g raw prawns, peeled and with tails intact (see Tips)
lemons, cut into wedges, to serve

preparations.content: Place oil into mixing bowl and heat <b>1 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Add garlic paste, ginger paste, eschalot and tomato and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>6 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>, <b>without measuring cup<b>. Scrape down sides and bottom of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add coconut milk and salt and cook <b>3 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>, <b>without measuring cup<b>.

Add tamarind paste and prawns. Ensure prawns are submerged below surface of the sauce, then cook <b>3-5 min/90°C/speed <b> or until prawns are just cooked. Transfer into serving bowls and garnish with coriander and lemon wedges before serving.

hintsAndTricks: If you are using cooked prawns, reduce cooking time by 1 minute or until prawns are heated through.
To make your own ginger paste, garlic paste and tamarind paste, please refer to the recipes on this recipe chip.
You can serve this with rice or one of your favourite sides.
